name: Intense Security at Burnwick End
description:
Officer Mick Jerards was injured on the battlefield and honorably discharged. He was offered a desk job of the utmost importance.

Use WASD to move, E to pick up, R to read open letters. The objective of the game is to sort through the mail and parcels and send them to the correct department or destroy them if they don't meet the regulations.
